name: Neptuna Saviour of the Seas Demo 1.0 (Alpha)
name_original: Neptuna Saviour of the Seas Demo 1.0 (Alpha)
description:
When all the World’s waters are finally ruined by pollution and human greed, climate change causes endless floods across the globe leaving billons to suffer. It is up to one hero; “Neptuna, Siren queen of Oceanna”, to defeat dreaded fossil-fueled robots eager to pollute more water by turning them into fossil fuels.

This game is currently only one level is more a proof of concept than a finished game. please do keep that in mind as you play this game.

CREDITS:

Art, Design, Sound, Producer: William Azemba
